text: Odd Lie (14 December 1926 - 5 May 2015) was a Norwegian gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Norwegian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Norway Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Drammen
title: Odd Lie
